definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: The product is extremely luxurious and the taste is so excellent.
sentences.chinese: 产品极尽奢华，品味扬其俊美。

sentences.english: The image of the handsome officer was reflected in the surface.
sentences.chinese: 那个俊美军官的形影是反映在表面的。

sentences.english: He was also very handsome and was born next after Absalom.
sentences.chinese: 他甚俊美，生在押沙龙之后。

sentences.english: A4: Over the tenth floor. you will see the hills some sort ofd rivers together. Sounds greaudio-videoailable at. right?
sentences.chinese: 十楼以上的单位可看到山和河景，格外俊美，对吗？

sentences.english: He is a boy and a soldier, beautiful and fierce, honorable and angry.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个男孩，一名战士，俊美而凶狠，可敬却气愤。

sentences.english: Hadn't he been handsome, and eager to please his wife?
sentences.chinese: 他不俊美吗，而且还那样殷勤地讨妻子喜欢。

sentences.english: Du Xiaomei is a countryside girl, the good-hearted appearance is delicate and pretty.
sentences.chinese: 杜小梅是农村的一个姑娘，心地善良长相俊美。

sentences.english: Make sure it's hand-written as well - nothing screams impersonal like typing.
sentences.chinese: 要确保书写俊美，不要让人觉得像打字机一样的冷漠。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a handsome boy appeared on the palace grounds.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，宫殿广场上出现了一位俊美的男孩。

sentences.english: His handsome eyes had a charming expression .
sentences.chinese: 他那俊美的双眼里有一种摄人心魄的表情。

sentences.english: He was ruddy, with a fine appearance and handsome features.
sentences.chinese: 他面色光红，双目清秀，容貌俊美。

definition: variant of 氣宇軒昂|气宇轩昂[qi4 yu3 xuan1 ang2]
